author: mikeehsu
body: The current URL ends in a 404 error. It looks like the filename was changed from install.ps1 to dotnet-install.ps1

comments.body: Hi **@mikeehsu**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! title: Updated URL to dotnet install.
